name: .WUT File Extension
summary: Learn about .WUT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a WUT file with WUSSoft WUTG Editor (Windows), to view and edit the audio tags the file contains. You can also use WUTG Editor to apply the tags a WUT file contains to an .MP3, .OGG, or .AC3 file (creating a resulting .WUS file).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
